thread.title: BRIEF-Vilkyskiu Pienine Ab Says Consolidated Sales For Dec 2017 Amounted To 7.95 Million Eur - 4% Decrease Versus To December 2016

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Vilkyskiu Pienine Ab Says Consolidated Sales For Dec 2017 Amounted To 7.95 Million Eur - 4% Decrease Versus To December 2016
text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - VILKYSKIU PIENINE AB:
* SAYS CONSOLIDATED SALES FOR DEC 2017 AMOUNTED TO 7.95 MILLION EUR - 4% DECREASE VERSUS TO DECEMBER 2016
* SAYS SALES FOR PERIOD 2017 AMOUNTED TO 113.9 MILLION EUR - 26% INCREASE VERSUS TO SAME PERIOD LAST YEAR. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
